nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 4am, then a chance of rain and patchy fog. Cloudy. Low around 40, with temperatures rising to around 51 overnight. South wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 51 in the afternoon. South wind 13 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 53 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 9pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 27. West wind 17 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 39. West wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 33. Southwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 45. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 23. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 33. Northwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 23. West wind around 8 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely before 3pm, then rain and snow likely between 3pm and 5pm, then rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 38. Southwest wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow before 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. West wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 38. Northwest wind around 12 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 25. West wind around 8 mph.

nws.name: Christmas Day
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Chance Light Rain
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 10am, then a chance of rain. Partly sunny, with a high near 42. Southwest wind around 8 mph.
